articles.description: Epson gained some scrutiny in recent weeks after it disabled a printer that was working fine, leading to accusations of planned obsolescence.
articles.content:
Planned obsolescence continues to blight us
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
